H0.text: Coal is a source of energy that is nonrenewable.

H1.text: Sunlight is a source of energy that is nonrenewable.

H2.text: Water is the source of energy that is nonrenewable.

H3.text: Wood is a source of energy that is nonrenewable.

A4.text: Natural resources such as coal, petroleum (crude oil) and natural gas take thousands of years to form naturally and cannot be replaced as fast as they are being consumed.

A5.text: renewable resources such as... solar energy... are practically infinite and cannot be depleted, unlike their non-renewable counterparts, which are likely to run out if not used sparingly.
